title: Update app icon with new Rawly41 circular logo

requirements.summary: Replace all existing app icons with the newly uploaded circular Rawly41 logo featuring pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background
acceptanceCriteria: The manifest.json file references the new icon files generated from the uploaded image
The frontend/index.html Apple touch icon meta tag points to the new 180x180 icon
All icon sizes (192x192, 512x512, 180x180) are generated from the new circular logo design
The icons display correctly when the app is added to home screen on both iOS and Android devices

file_operations.description: Update the icons array to reference the new generated icon files at frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-192.dim_192x192.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-512.dim_512x512.png. Keep all other manifest properties (name, short_name, description, start_url, display, theme_color, background_color) unchanged.

Update the Apple touch icon link tag to reference the new generated icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png. Ensure the href path is correct relative to the public directory and maintain all other meta tags and PWA configuration unchanged.
